using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
long long int ans(long long int n)
{
    	long long int sol;
        if (n<0)
        {
            return 0;
        }
        else
	    sol=(((n+3)*(n+2)*(n+1))/6);
        return sol;    
}
int main()
{
        long long int N,A,B,C,t,i;
        long long int soln;
        scanf("%lld",&t);
        while(t--)
        {
            scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld",&N,&A,&B,&C);
            soln=ans(N)-ans(N-A-1)-ans(N-B-1)-ans(N-C-1)+ans(N-A-B-2)+ans(N-B-C-2)+ans(N-A-C-2)-ans(N-A-B-C-3);
            printf("%lld\n",soln);
        }
        return 0;
}
